text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
On the day of the exhibition race, we get to watch Tannhauser run. 
Afterward…

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I think that's basically how things went. That's why at this 
point…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Tannhauseeer!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ah—Kita, Sato! You came to watch me! Sorry, I really flubbed it 
big-time, huh?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: What are you talking about? Tannhauser, you were sooooo…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: So cool out there!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
On the final stretch, when Rice was sprinting after the front runner 
Bourbon, you were hot on their heels and steadily closing the gap.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
But it wasn't working! You couldn't quite reach them! With just 200 
meters to the finish line, you could've changed strategies and 
protected your third place position.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
But you never gave up. Even though you knew you wouldn't catch 
them, you still gave everything you had until the very end.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, but that's why I didn't notice the racer coming up from behind. 
And where'd it get me? Fourth place. Haha, I really don't have a good 
endgame.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Still, you had some sort of strategy, right? You tried to speed up 
despite knowing the risk.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh? Nah, that wasn't a strategy. I was just trying to win the race.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Isn't that what all racers do? There's no point if we don't aim to win, is 
there?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
But I guess a loser like me shouldn't be handing out advice, huh? 
Haha… I knew just trying wouldn't be enough.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I've got to keep pushing myself nonstop to get better, just like Teio 
and McQueen do.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Sigh… Which means I gotta train more. Let's see, I guess starting from tomorrow…
Rustle, rustle…

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whoa! My notebook!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
I'll grab it for you! …Oh, wow! The level of detail in these notes is 
incredible!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Ah—this is the book you carry everywhere.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
"Special Pre-Race Training Routine," "Early Morning Running 
Checklist," "Ikuno's Recommended Gym Regimen by Muscle Group"…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, look at all the routines and schedules! And you've written 
"Gotta work hard!" so many times…

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Aah, don't read that! It's just a bunch of embarrassing scribbles… 
Urgh.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
You haven't been doing all of these routines, have you? Every day? 
Even with all that community service?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Is that weird? I thought it was a pretty normal amount of work…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: This is a normal amount?! I'm no expert, but this feels like way too much!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Still, I'm pretty sure I need to increase my weight training. Hmm, I'll 
have to rearrange some things… My schedule's always so packed.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I don't have any secret weapons or special skills. If I want to win 
against those monster racers, there's only one option.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I've just gotta work as hard as I can. Push myself more and more… so I 
can live up to the expectations of everyone supporting me.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Tannhauser was so amazing on the track, but she still doesn't consider 
herself special.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Maybe that's what being at this school does to you. Tannhauser was 
definitely amazing, but there are even stronger racers…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, everyone here is on a whole other level. I knew that'd be the 
case, but still…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: …Okay, we're all here! Wanna get started?

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Oh? Something's happening over there…

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, let's get this strategy sesh rolling! Us ex-convicts gotta make 
our grand comeback!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Woo, ex-comics! Wait, what's that?!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
I'm just saying our community service is finally over, yeah? We 
seriously worked our butts off—headpats all around!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: We brought it on ourselves, you know.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Now that we have more free time, it would be nice if we could work 
together to improve our skills.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
I think we all know we're not exactly Tracen's best and brightest. But 
different perspectives might help us change that.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
I agree. If you recall, I was trying to organize a joint training session in 
the first place. But somehow we got off track…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Seriously, how did we get dragged into this? We always seem to draw the short straw when we're with you guys.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Huuuh? You're not coming, Nature? But I wanted to run with you!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Ngh… This was all your fault in the first place… Also, I didn't say I 
wouldn't do it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Hehe. All right then, let's kick off the meeting! For victory!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: They're so focused all of a sudden. I feel like I barely know them…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
They're all serious about getting first place. I guess at Tracen, that's a 
normal thing, huh.
